Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and measure non-microbial analyte(s) in human clinical specimens to aid in assessment of patients with suspected sepsis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Roche Elecsys BRAHMS PCT assay measuring procalcitonin in serum and plasma for assessment in suspected sepsis using electrochemiluminescence immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative in vitro determination of procalcitonin in human serum and plasma to aid in risk assessment for progression to severe sepsis/septic shock, evaluation of 28-day mortality in severe sepsis/septic shock, and decision making for antibiotic therapy/discontinuation in suspected or confirmed lower respiratory tract infections or sepsis.
